title: Stop the Presses
content:
Stop the Presses Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Lower City Reward Trader discount

Stop the Presses

Stop the Presses is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Stop the Presses can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Stop the Presses Objectives

Talk to the editor of the Baldur's Mouth Gazette. Stop the Baldur's Mouth Gazette printing slander. Print a
